customer_addr:
1 N WAUKEGAN RD
NORTH CHICAGO, IL 60064

citations.narrative:
During a routine inspection on June 24th, 2025 it was noted from the August, 2024 IACUC meeting minutes that 4 dogs
went without food from 1:48pm on July 18th, 2024 until 6:26am on July 20th, 2024, which was not related to their study.
The dogs were on an active study and otherwise in good condition. The dogs were examined on July 20th without any
finding of ill effect.
Dogs must be fed at least once each day, except as otherwise might be required to provide adequate veterinary care. All
dogs must be provided adequate food at least once per day.
To be corrected from today and going forward: June 24th, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
Additional Inspectors:
Alexandra Friedman, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
3.9(a) 
   
Feeding 
During a routine inspection on June 24th, 2025 it was noted from the August, 2024 IACUC meeting minutes that 4 dogs 
went without food from 1:48pm on July 18th, 2024 until 6:26am on July 20th, 2024, which was not related to their study. 
The dogs were on an active study and otherwise in good condition. The dogs were examined on July 20th without any 
finding of ill effect.  
Dogs must be fed at least once each day, except as otherwise might be required to provide adequate veterinary care. All 
dogs must be provided adequate food at least once per day.  
To be corrected from today and going forward: June 24th, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
